description: Amendments to planning permission dated 7 September 2020 (RN: 20/02661/FULL) for, 'Use of part first floor and second floor as 8 x flats (Class C3)'. [Land use swap with 58 Brook Street (Ref: 20/02577/FULL), 60 Brook Street (Ref: 20/02578/FULL) and 1-7 Davies Mews and 28-30 South Molton Lane (Ref: 20/02575/FULL)]; Namely, to add additional lobbies included between the main stair core and apartments 1A and 2A at first floor and apartments 2D and 2E at second floor, plant cupboards have been included within all the units to accommodate services, reconfiguration of unit layouts to switch the kitchens with the bedrooms, existing chimney breasts included, relocation of toilets and redundant fire escape stair removed from level 2, relocation of recycling and waste store and provision of a fire wall around, relocation of cycle parking spaces to be provided in 2 x enclosed stores, provision of a bike maintenance station and electric bike charging point; and relocation of the existing WC.
